org.team5940.robot_core.modules.functional

Interface TankDrivetrainModule

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Module, OwnableModule

    public interface TankDrivetrainModule
extends OwnableModule
    Represents a drivetrain with two fixed sets of wheels. For anyone who uses this: Make sure it extends ShifterModule if it can.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void updateArcade(double forward, double right)
      Updates a tank drivetrain for arcade control, multiplexing straight and turning.
      void updateTank(double left, double right)
      Updates a tank drivetrain for tank control, invidually moving each set of wheels.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.team5940.robot_core.modules.ownable.OwnableModule

        acquireOwnershipFor, isNotOwned, isOwnedBy, relinquishOwnershipFor

      • Methods inherited from interface org.team5940.robot_core.modules.Module

        getName, getSubModules, initialize, setLogger, shutDown

    • Method Detail

      • updateTank

        void updateTank(double left,
                double right)
        Updates a tank drivetrain for tank control, invidually moving each set of wheels.
        Parameters:
        left - the speed you want for the left side. -1 to 1, inclusive for both.
        right - the speed you want for the right side. -1 to 1, inclusive for both.

      • updateArcade

        void updateArcade(double forward,
                  double right)
        Updates a tank drivetrain for arcade control, multiplexing straight and turning.
        Parameters:
        forward - The speed of the vertical speed. -1 to 1, inclusive for both.
        right - The speed of the horizontal speed. -1 to 1, inclusive for both.
